name: Gibson's Awesome Basics in Stuff and Other Stuff!
name_original: Gibson's Awesome Basics in Stuff and Other Stuff!
description:
Oh noes! You clicked on a scamym Discord Nitro link and now you have ben transpourted to Gibson's house! You have too collect the 7 noteboos to get out of Gibson's house!

Get only one answer wrong in the first notebook to unlock Impossible Mode! This is definitely a feature and not a bug that I don't know how to fix!

IF YOU USE DUAL MONITORS (or more if you're insane) AND THE GAME DOESN'T START ON YOUR MAIN MONITOR, PRESS ALT+ENTER TO PUT THE GAME ON WINDOWED MODE, DRAG THE GAME TO YOUR MAIN MONITOR, AND PRESS ALT+ENTER AGAIN!
